#labels Actions
[AbstractSynchronizedAction SynchronizedAction] to tell a `MovieClip` object to play a specified frame.

The syntax for the constructor is...
{{{	
new SynchronizedGotoFrame(offset:*, target:MovieClip, frameIdentifier:*);
}}}
With `target` being the !MovieClip to play and `frameIdentifier` being a string or a frame number.
